s.text: The most feared (in a good-natured, humorous way) teen news--other than the startlingly high number of "your child was killed in a car crash" (in a lighthearted, frolicsome way)--was this: Your adolescent is enjoying sex and drugs.

After giving the little miscreant a sound thrashing, the governor and his wife will throw Raymond out of the house and disinherit him, or, if you choose to believe the pronouncement of parents befuddled by grief: "We will offer Raymond our unconditional and abiding love, support and guidance."
. We feel this will go a long way in carrying out our responsibilities to the parents of America.
. We feel this will go a long way in carrying out our responsibilities to the parents of America.
Drinking--21, in accordance with the law of the land

And we hope Adam Sandler makes good use of his time on Prison Island."
And we hope Adam Sandler makes good use of his time on Prison Island."
Once you get your adolescent to endorse this idea (and to forget that Juliet was just 14), you've won.
. He acknowledged his mistake but also said, 'Don't forget, I'm a three-time N.B.A.
